description:
Keep your little rider safe. Whether they are already confident on 2-wheels or making the transition from their first strider bike, this reliable helmet will help keep them safe. And, it has great designs that they will love, and great protection that you will love.

  • KinetiCore® technology uses integrated crumple zones to absorb both direct and rotational impact forces. Independent testing has shown that KinteiCore offers the same quality of protection as MIPS liners
  • KinetiCore uses less EPS foam than previous versions, resulting in a lighter helmet with a lower carbon footprint
  • EZ Fit system adjust automatically to different head sizes, simply open and put the helmet on
  • Cheek level buckle reduces the chances of pinched skin
  • Deep design offers improved protection on the temples and back of the head
  • 12 vents combined with KinetiCore crumple blocks offer great airflow to help them keep a cool head
  • Mount port for the Lazer universal rear light (sold separately)
  • Lightweight in-mold construction
name: Lazer Nutz Kineticore Helmet - Children to Youths
